## Source: ossf-package-analysis (333a48f2dfbcb9ab75608fb120182771732f71543d3bc13c3352b144b3022403)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'latam-xp-analytics-plugin-gtm' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
